enum.summary: What are the different types of actions that can occur as a part of composer.

field.name: Transform
field.value: The file being read needs to be transformed into a different structure.

field.name: Split
field.value: The file being read needs to be split into multiple files.

field.name: SplitAndTransform
field.value: The file being read needs to be split into multiple files and each file is grouped on a property.

field.name: FileRename
field.value: The file/folder being read needs to be renamed.

enum.summary: What are the different files that can be generated.
